job_tasks.phrase: You can build web applications autonomously from scratch.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering task of creating applications independently.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility for the entire lifecycle of a solution, a key aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work.
job_tasks.justification: This describes integration into a team and understanding existing systems, which is part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions for millions of customers.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building Gen AI solutions, which falls under model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to creating reusable components, a common software engineering practice for scalability and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a collaborative coding practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This covers the full software development lifecycle from building to running, with an emphasis on scalability and quality, applied to Gen AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to automating development and operational tasks, which is a core MLOps/DevOps activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration and continuous improvement through interaction with others.

soft_skills.phrase: Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.
Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a collaborative and learning-oriented team environment.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes building and running 'Gen AI solutions' and converting parts into 're-usable building blocks' for other teams, indicating a strong focus on software engineering (Macro-Category A). While it mentions building Gen AI solutions, it doesn't detail specific model development, fine-tuning, or prompt engineering tasks (Macro-Category B). The role is primarily about integrating and operationalizing Gen AI within a software engineering context, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software engineering responsibilities and the integration of Gen AI. However, it lacks specific details on the depth of Gen AI specialization (e.g., specific models, fine-tuning techniques), which prevents a perfect score. The profile assignment is strongly supported by the emphasis on building and running solutions and re-usable components.
